description: City mayor Anne Hidalgo mocks the "absurd" penalty for breaking equal employment rules.
title: Paris mayor mocks 'absurd' fine for hiring too many women
title_page: Paris mayor mocks 'absurd' fine for hiring too many women - BBC News
maintext: The 2013 rule meant no more than 60% of new appointments to management positions in public service should go to one sex. Ms Hidalgo's recruitment drive saw 69% of the jobs go to women.
